name: BallBlast
description:
Instructions:

move the player horizontally and hit the monsters until killing them, each monster killed will release coins that will disappear after a few seconds, the more coins you collect the more you increase the firepower, also bonuses can be spawned, these too will disappear after a short time.

Try to get as far as you can in the game by beating the previous record and collecting as many coins as possible.

Good fun.
